description: The Azuma Murasaki Japanese Maple is an amazing species due to its exquisite foliage. In spring the foliage is a deep purple that transitions to the bright green of summer. In autumn, the leaves turn from yellow to red to orange, creating a truly stunning display of color. The delicate, lacy leaves are stunning in any landscape and can be enjoyed for their beauty for many months out of the year. As an added benefit, this hardy plant is resistant to disease and pests, making it an ideal species for all kinds of spaces.
